title: 📧 Email Generator 🍳
input1: Recipient: {name:Jane Smith} Subject: {subject:Quarterly Sales Report} Personal pronouns: {pronouns: We} Opening: {pleasantries: I hope this message finds you well} Main Points: {Main_points: Provide an overview of the sales figures and request feedback on the report} Tone: {Tone: Professional, informative, encouraging} Call to Action: {name:Please review the attached report and share your insights.} Closing: {Closing: Thank you for your continued support. Sincerely}
input2: Recipient: {name:Michael Johnson} Subject: {subject:Upcoming Team Meeting} Personal pronouns: {pronouns: I} Opening: {pleasantries: Thank you for your prompt response} Main Points: {Main_points: Confirm the meeting agenda and ask for any additional topics to discuss} Tone: {Tone: Professional, informative, collaborative} Call to Action: {name:Please let me know if you have any other items to add to the agenda.} Closing: {Closing: I appreciate your input and look forward to our discussion. Best regards}
input1_ans:
Subject: Quarterly Sales Report

Dear Jane Smith,

I hope this message finds you well.

We would like to provide an overview of the sales figures for the last quarter and request your feedback on the attached report. 

Please review the attached report and share your insights.

Thank you for your continued support.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]  
[Your Contact Information]

Subject: Quarterly Sales Report

Dear Jane Smith,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to provide you with an overview of the sales figures for the last quarter. The attached report outlines our performance, highlighting key trends and areas for improvement. We would greatly appreciate your feedback on the report, as your insights are invaluable to us.

Please review the attached report and share your insights.

Thank you for your continued support.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]
input2_ans:
Subject: Upcoming Team Meeting

Dear Michael Johnson,

Thank you for your prompt response.

I would like to confirm the meeting agenda and ask if you have any additional topics to discuss. 

Please let me know if you have any other items to add to the agenda.

I appreciate your input and look forward to our discussion.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]

Subject: Upcoming Team Meeting

Dear Michael Johnson,

Thank you for your prompt response. 

I would like to confirm the meeting agenda and ask if you have any additional topics you would like to discuss. 

Please let me know if you have any other items to add to the agenda.

I appreciate your input and look forward to our discussion.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
